title: SE blurs lines with the fun and versatile OM-Duro 27.5+ BMX / MTB Hybrid Bike
content:
All the fun and playfulness of a BMX bike with all-terrain capability? Sounds like a recipe for good times! If you didn’t know, SE Bikes’ motto is “BMX Innovations” so it makes sense that they’ve brought us the OM-Duro – a BMX/MTB hybrid that’s bound to inspire some creative riding. I’ll admit, until I owned […]

The post SE blurs lines with the fun and versatile OM-Duro 27.5+ BMX / MTB Hybrid Bike appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Steve Fisher
